00083 class MicropolisStartPanel(gtk.Frame):
00084 
00085 
00086     def __init__(
00087         self,
00088         engine=None,
00089         target=None,
00090         **args):
00091 
00092         gtk.Frame.__init__(
00093             self,
00094             **args)
00095 
00096         self.engine = engine
00097         self.target = target
00098 
00099         engine.expressInterest(
00100             self,
00101             ('load', 'gameMode',))
00102 
00103         controls = []
00104         self.controls = controls
00105 
00106         # Views
00107 
00108         hbox1 = gtk.HBox(False, 5)
00109         self.hbox1 = hbox1
00110         self.add(hbox1)
00111 
00112         vbox1 = gtk.VBox(False, 5)
00113         self.vbox1 = vbox1
00114         hbox1.pack_start(vbox1, True, True, 0)
00115 
00116         hbox2 = gtk.HBox(False, 5)
00117         self.hbox2 = hbox2
00118         vbox1.pack_start(hbox2, False, False, 10)
00119 
00120         previewMapView = micropolisdrawingarea.PreviewMicropolisDrawingArea(
00121                 engine=engine)
00122         self.previewMapView = previewMapView
00123         previewMapView.set_size_request(
00124             micropolisengine.WORLD_W * 3,
00125             micropolisengine.WORLD_H * 3)
00126 
00127         hbox2.pack_start(previewMapView, False, False, 5)
00128 
00129         vbox2 = gtk.VBox(False, 5)
00130         self.vbox2 = vbox2
00131         hbox2.pack_start(vbox2, True, True, 0)
00132 
00133         markup = (
00134             '<b><span size="xx-large">Micropolis City Simulator</span></b>'
00135         )
00136 
00137         labelMicropolis = gtk.Label()
00138         self.labelMicropolis = labelMicropolis
00139         labelMicropolis.set_markup(markup)
00140         vbox2.pack_start(labelMicropolis, False, False, 5)
00141 
00142         labelTitle = gtk.Label()
00143         self.labelTitle = labelTitle
00144         vbox2.pack_start(labelTitle, False, False, 5)
00145 
00146         labelDescription = gtk.Label()
00147         self.labelDescription = labelDescription
00148         labelDescription.set_line_wrap(True)
00149         vbox2.pack_start(labelDescription, True, True, 5)
00150 
00151         button = gtk.Button('Play with This City')
00152         controls.append(button)
00153         button.connect('clicked', lambda item: target.playCity())
00154         vbox2.pack_start(button, False, False, 0)
00155 
00156         hbox3 = gtk.HBox(False, 5)
00157         self.hbox3 = hbox3
00158         vbox2.pack_start(hbox3, False, False, 0)
00159 
00160         button = gtk.Button('Generate City')
00161         controls.append(button)
00162         button.connect('clicked', lambda item: target.generateCity())
00163         hbox3.pack_start(button, True, True, 0)
00164 
00165         button = gtk.Button('Load City')
00166         controls.append(button)
00167         button.connect('clicked', lambda item: target.loadCityDialog())
00168         hbox3.pack_start(button, True, True, 0)
00169 
00170         scenariosPerGroup = 2
00171         scenarioInGroup = scenariosPerGroup
00172 
00173         scenarioGroup = None
00174 
00175         hbox2 = gtk.HBox(False, 5)
00176         self.hbox2 = hbox2
00177 
00178         vbox1.pack_start(hbox2, False, False, 5)
00179 
00180         for scenario in engine.scenarios[1:]: # Skip SC_NONE.
00181 
00182             scenarioID = scenario['id']
00183             scenarioTitle = scenario['title']
00184 
00185             if scenarioInGroup == scenariosPerGroup:
00186                 scenarioInGroup = 0
00187                 scenarioGroup = gtk.VBox(False, 5)
00188                 hbox2.pack_start(scenarioGroup, True, True, 0)
00189 
00190             scenarioInGroup += 1
00191 
00192             vbox = gtk.VBox(False, 5)
00193             controls.append(vbox)
00194             scenarioGroup.pack_start(vbox, False, False, 0)
00195 
00196             button = gtk.Button(scenarioTitle)
00197             button.scenarioID = scenarioID
00198             controls.append(button)
00199             button.connect('clicked', lambda item: self.startScenario(item.scenarioID))
00200             vbox.pack_start(button, False, False, 0)
00201 
00202             image = gtk.Image()
00203             image.set_from_file(
00204                 'images/micropolisEngine/scenario' +
00205                 str(scenario['id']) +
00206                 'Icon.png')
00207             vbox.pack_start(image, False, False, 0)
00208 
00209 
00210     def update(self, name, *args):
00211 
00212         engine = self.engine
00213 
00214         if name == 'load':
00215 
00216             title = engine.title
00217             description = engine.description
00218             
00219             titleMarkup = (
00220                 '<b><span size="x-large">' +
00221                 title +
00222                 '</span></b>'
00223             )
00224 
00225             descriptionMarkup = (
00226                 '<span size="large">' +
00227                 description +
00228                 '</span>'
00229             )
00230 
00231             self.labelTitle.set_markup(titleMarkup)
00232             self.labelDescription.set_markup(descriptionMarkup)
00233 
00234         elif name == 'gameMode':
00235             
00236             gameMode = engine.gameMode
00237             previewMapView = self.previewMapView
00238 
00239             if gameMode == 'start':
00240 
00241                 previewMapView.engage()
00242                 previewMapView.updateView()
00243 
00244             elif gameMode == 'play':
00245 
00246                 previewMapView.disengage()
00247 
00248 
00249     def startScenario(self, scenarioID):
00250         print "STARTSCENARIO", scenarioID
00251 
00252         self.target.startScenario(scenarioID)
00253
